title: oauth2
description: This type defines the Oauth2 authentication credential object and is used by agents and targets when performing oauth2 authentication. This object inherits all of the authentication credentials common properties (see section 6.1). In addition to the inherited properties, this section defines two additional specific properties that are valid for this type.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be 'oauth2'.

oauth_header.description: The OAuth header used in OAuth authentication as defined in section 3.5.1 of [RFC5849] and [RFC6750].

token.description: The bearer token used in HTTP Bearer Token authentication as defined by [RFC6749] and [RFC6750]. This value SHOULD be passed in via a variable.
